Articles.Content:
Hello

I have downloaded the Rods from the Gods mod: http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/226577-rods-from-the-gods

I have placed it in my game data folder like other mods but it doesn't seem to work.

Anyone else use this mod and know what I am doing wrong?

Thanks

Well, if the picture is any indicator, it's badly out of date. Like, three or more versions. Make sure that the file structure is correct. If that's not the issue, it's the .cfg files involved. That's not my area of expertise, though...

Might want to hit up sal the mod, I believe this was his creation.

I can't run the Unity editor so it's going to stay un-updated, but it's literally just a rod and a winglet, not hard to make.

Also I never uploaded it anywhere but here...

If you got it from there can see why looks like the file is not setup right.

EDIT- Isn't there a newer mod out like this ? will look, I'm sure there is let me see now.

EDIT- This was the one, I was thinking of Kinetic Penetrator http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128617

But if you do want that rod and fins in game it won't be hard to fix it.

Edited August 16, 2015 by Mecripp2

It pre-dates the GameData folder, has the wrong format cfg files and it's DAE+png, I might be able to re-export it with Taniwa's blender plugin but it'll look pretty rough.

Now we have I-beams and basic winglets it's possible to make stock rods now too.
Thanks for all the quick answers, I shall check out the Kinetic Predator

Fixed it so you can get it in game, I did rescale the winglets to 0.5 they was 0.1 added 

PART {} , rescale = * , TechRequired = start , entryCost = * , changed the *.dae to *.MU and textures to dds

EDIT- Whoops forgot the download []

Edit- http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ All credit to sal_vager for the parts

Edited August 16, 2015 by Mecripp2

Thanks MeCripp, been playing around with Kinetic Predator but it's not really working for me in game.

Where do I place this?

Edited August 16, 2015 by gredawarha
Don't forget the licence terms, and the addon posting rules.

Don't forget the licence terms, and the addon posting rules.

Your licence is in the download and @gredawarha you can just unzip it in KSP/GameData but there isn't really anything to do with it that you would have to put what you want in the cfg.
